hero.title: I solve problems; code is just the tool
hero.subtitle: For {{years}} years I've taken ideas to the internet—designing solutions, building products, and shipping them. And I also use AI every day.

services.title: Services
services.subtitle: Tailored digital solutions to bring ideas to life and strengthen your online presence.

customDev.title: Custom Web Development
customDev.desc: From-scratch applications and sites—optimized, scalable, and architected for your business goals.

saas.title: SaaS Development
saas.desc: Robust, secure platforms built to scale with authentication, payments, and modern dashboards.

ecommerce.title: Online Stores
ecommerce.desc: WooCommerce or Shopify setups with seamless checkout, payment integrations, and inventory control.

landing.title: Landing Pages
landing.desc: Conversion-focused pages for products, events, waitlists, and marketing campaigns.

consulting.title: Web Consulting
consulting.desc: Validate ideas, assess technical and financial feasibility, and receive realistic budgeting guidance.

teaching.title: Personalized Programming Classes
teaching.desc: Hands-on mentorship tailored to your level, using real projects and modern tools.

about.title: About Me
about.intro: I'm Luis Rodríguez, known as Lucho Web. I've been a web developer for 14 years, helping companies and entrepreneurs bring ideas to life online.
about.experience: I began as a PHP developer, then shifted toward the Frontend world. After 9+ years working with WordPress, I built a strong full-stack profile.
about.modern: In the last 5 years, I've worked with modern stacks like React, Node, and Vue, following agile methodologies, using Git version control, and embracing clean scalable code practices.
about.ai: And these last two years have been the best. I have incorporated AI into my daily routine and have managed to improve my code, but also my development, deployment, and delivery times. AI has boosted my performance threefold.
about.highlightsTitle: A few milestones along the way

highlights.fullstack: Over a decade of full-stack development and complex custom builds.
highlights.tech: Experience with React, Node, Vue, PHP, and the WordPress ecosystem.
highlights.methodologies: Skilled in agile workflows and professional version control with Git.
highlights.evolution: Witnessed the web's evolution—from table layouts to Flex and Grid, from jQuery's rise to the reign of modern frameworks.
